name: Fury Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have double strike.
flavor_text:
"A rift opened, and our arrows were abruptly stilled. To move was to push the world. But the sliver's claw still twitched, red wounds appeared in Thed's chest, and ribbons of blood hung in the air."
—Adom Capashen, Benalish hero

name: Kor Outfitter
oracle_text: When Kor Outfitter enters the battlefield, you may attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.
flavor_text: "We take only what we need to survive. Believe me, you will need this."

name: Siren Lookout
oracle_text:
Flying
When Siren Lookout enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Web
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)

name: Surge of Brilliance
oracle_text:
Paradox — Draw a card for each spell you've cast this turn from anywhere other than your hand.
Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
flavor_text: "They may have superior numbers, but we have superior minds."

name: Obyra's Attendants // Desperate Parry

card_faces.name: Obyra's Attendants
card_faces.flavor_text: Obyra's devoted servants shrieked as their sleeping mistress slashed at them, unseeing.

card_faces.name: Desperate Parry
card_faces.oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. (Then exile this card. You may cast the creature later from exile.)

flavor_text: Obyra's devoted servants shrieked as their sleeping mistress slashed at them, unseeing.

name: Venerable Knight
oracle_text: When Venerable Knight dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target Knight you control.
flavor_text: "May this blade guide you on your great journey, as it did me on mine."

name: Wildcall
oracle_text: Manifest the top card of your library, then put X +1/+1 counters on it. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)
flavor_text: A howl on the wind hides many dangers.

name: Mystic Skyfish
oracle_text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Mystic Skyfish gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The problem wasn't that fish had learned how to fly. It was that sharks had adapted to follow them.
